data.name: 0000 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The instant I had erased all of the singularities―

data.name: 0001 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The music room changed with a flash of light that caused me to impulsively close my eyes--

data.name: 0002 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Rather, it turned back to normal.

data.name: 0003 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh... Damn it…

data.name: 0004 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It felt as if the whole room turned over.

data.name: 0005 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looking around, the other member that came in with me was sitting on the floor.

data.name: 0006 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ouch…

data.name: 0007 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's quite impressive that she always ends up falling on her backside so grandly.

data.name: 0008 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ow ow ow…

data.name: 0009 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you alright, Asahina?

data.name: 0010 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes, I'm fine.

data.name: 0011 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's a relief…

data.name: 0012 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: More importantly, if we don't act fast Suzumiya will come...

data.name: 0013 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Oh yeah, that's right.

data.name: 0014 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's been on her way the whole time we were doing that.

data.name: 0015 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what should we do?

data.name: 0016 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya may have heard the sound of the piano...

data.name: 0017 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We certainly can't rule it out…

data.name: 0018 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If she did... it's really not good.

data.name: 0019 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Th-that's right!

data.name: 0020 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we play it off as if it were you playing it?

data.name: 0021 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no way... I can't play the piano...

data.name: 0022 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh... Right...

data.name: 0023 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What about you?

data.name: 0024 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Unfortunately, I can't either…

data.name: 0025 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0026 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it--we don't have time to flounder.

data.name: 0027 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We need an answer that'll satisfy Haruhi…

data.name: 0029 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: 'Ello? If it isn't Mikuru! Whatcha doing in a place like this?

data.name: 0030 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, Tsuruya…

data.name: 0031 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Sitting in front of the piano like that--are you holding a concert or something this time?

data.name: 0032 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: So, was it you that played that strange piece just now, Mikuru?

data.name: 0033 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: No, I ca... Oh, right!

data.name: 0034 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You said you could play the piano, right, Tsuruya?!

data.name: 0035 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Eh? Ah, only a little.

data.name: 0036 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What good timing for you to show up, huh.

data.name: 0037 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Can you play it for us right now?

data.name: 0038 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I don't see why not, but whatcha want me to play?

data.name: 0039 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't mind! Anything!

data.name: 0040 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Anything, huh... I'm not sure...

data.name: 0041 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Please--!

data.name: 0042 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Welp--If that's what you want, I suppose I can't decline. Hm, lemme give it a go.

data.name: 0043 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Here goes…

data.name: 0046 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tsuruya sat down in front of the keys and began playing a pleasant and jaunty tune.

data.name: 0047 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wow…

data.name: 0048 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's always endlessly cheerful, and even playing the piano she's ever the same.

data.name: 0049 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Each time her fingertips sprung from the keys with that light and joyful touch...

data.name: 0050 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...it was as if she was spinning up an indescribable mysterious melody.

data.name: 0051 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And so, after listening to Tsuruya's performance for a little while…

data.name: 0052 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This time I've definitely heard you!

data.name: 0053 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Following a thundering of footsteps, it was none other than Haruhi herself who burst in.

data.name: 0054 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm…?

data.name: 0055 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Tsuruya? It was Tsuruya who was playing the piano?

data.name: 0056 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah, that's right.

data.name: 0057 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was Tsuruya the whole time?

data.name: 0058 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But, part way through the song changed--what was that about?

data.name: 0059 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So Haruhi really did hear it…

data.name: 0060 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, right now we have no choice but to trick her.

data.name: 0061 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The piano was all played by Tsuruya―

data.name: 0062 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As long as we can get Haruhi to accept that, everything should work out nicely.

data.name: 0063 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right? In hindsight it wasn't really a big deal, wasn't it.

data.name: 0064 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But wait a moment--Isn't it strange?

data.name: 0065 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what is?

data.name: 0066 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Just think about it?

data.name: 0067 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Tsuruya only came to the school after noon, you know?

data.name: 0068 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So who was playing the piano that the Computer Society member heard?

data.name: 0069 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Th-that's…

data.name: 0070 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's right--that's the one thing Tsuruya's playing isn't able to explain.

data.name: 0071 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it... What should I do?

data.name: 0072 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That was rather rough indeed.

data.name: 0073 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Absolutely…

data.name: 0074 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, are you okay?

data.name: 0075 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: No problem.

data.name: 0076 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: More importantly, Haruhi Suzumiya is getting close.

data.name: 0077 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Estimating based on her distance, the probability that she heard the piano is high.

data.name: 0078 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What...?!

data.name: 0079 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Things aren't looking good. We must make a move.

data.name: 0080 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Make a move, you say…

data.name: 0081 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, we could play it off as if one of us were playing the piano…

data.name: 0082 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Regrettably, I am unable to play...

data.name: 0083 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I can't either.

data.name: 0084 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Which would leave Nagato as our only hope…

data.name: 0085 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, can you do us a favor?

data.name: 0086 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What?

data.name: 0087 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Can't you play the same piece from before?

data.name: 0088 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I can.

data.name: 0089 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see, then―

data.name: 0090 (416.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Though, it would be best not to.

data.name: 0091 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-why?

data.name: 0092 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We yet have another option.

data.name: 0093 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Saying so, Koizumi put a CD into the room's CD player.

data.name: 0094 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This music is…

data.name: 0095 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right, it's the music that was playing in the Computer Society clubroom that time.

data.name: 0096 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I borrowed it just in case, thinking I may be able to make use of it somewhere.

data.name: 0099 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This time I've definitely heard you!

data.name: 0100 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Following a thundering of footsteps, it was none other than Haruhi herself who burst in.

data.name: 0102 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What're you doing, Kyon?

data.name: 0103 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asking me that directly to my face--I'm honestly not sure what to say...

data.name: 0104 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, what was that music earlier?

data.name: 0105 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I definitely heard it coming from here.

data.name: 0106 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well…

data.name: 0108 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh my oh my? What's everyone up to?

data.name: 0109 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeek... Suzuimya...

data.name: 0110 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina and... Tsuruya?

data.name: 0112 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're rather blessed with visitors today.

data.name: 0113 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I kinda thought "hey, I hear music," so I thought I'd pop on by, and...

data.name: 0114 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: ...I was like, "isn't that Mikuru panting in the corner of the hallway?"

data.name: 0115 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: So I thought I'd pick up Mikuru and came over here…

data.name: 0116 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: What's going on?

data.name: 0118 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's what I'd like to know as well.

data.name: 0119 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What on earth was that music earlier?

data.name: 0121 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Right after Miss Suzumiya left, we happened upon this CD.

data.name: 0122 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I think most likely the Computer Society left it behind in here.

data.name: 0123 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We were just listening to it out of interest.

data.name: 0124 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How do you lie so much yet so smoothly?

data.name: 0125 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez, that was misleading.

data.name: 0126 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I thought the piano started playing by itself.

data.name: 0127 (416.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: My most sincere apologies.

data.name: 0128 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like we avoided any trouble… right?

data.name: 0129 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Walking down the hallway with Haruhi, music started playing from the end of the hallway.

data.name: 0130 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is...!

data.name: 0131 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon! Did you hear that just now?!

data.name: 0132 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah…

data.name: 0133 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What on earth... Haruhi heard the music…

data.name: 0134 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, let's go!

data.name: 0135 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As expected, Haruhi ran to the music room at full speed.

data.name: 0136 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This time I've definitely heard you!

data.name: 0137 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Uhh, what?

data.name: 0138 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Whoa there, Haru-nyan--what's got you in a rush?

data.name: 0139 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As we burst into the music room, we were faced with Tsuruya sitting at the piano.

data.name: 0140 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What…?

data.name: 0141 (416.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Was that you playing the piano just now, Tsuruya?

data.name: 0143 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's right--Tsuruya is really good.

data.name: 0144 (416.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Not at all--you're so over the top, Mikuru~

data.name: 0145 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...I see... Quick thinking from Koizumi, huh?

data.name: 0146 (416.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez, don't do anything misleading, okay?

data.name: 0147 (416.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm sorry.

data.name: 0148 (416.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like we got out of a tight spot-- is what I guess I should say.

data.name: 0149 (416.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
